item.title: Godot and Blender presentations from the Capitole du Libre 2017
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: Last week-end we went to the Capitole du Libre, a major event around Free Software in France, to showcase Godot. We met there with Gilles Roudi√®re and Julian Murgia, two active contributors. It was a busy event: even though there were fewer visitors than at FOSDEM, people kept coming to the Godot table, curious about the engine’s features. Julian and Gilles gave a two-hours workshop based on @KidsCanCode’s Your first game tutorial.
